name: Beware The Button
description:
A short platformer where nobody can decide what the gimmick is.

WARNING: GAME DOES NOT DISPLAY CORRECTLY UNLESS IN FULLSCREEN.

Features include:

  • Unique ideas!
  • Over 4 levels!
  • Video gameplay!
  • Chiptune soundtrack!

This game was made for the GMTK 2020 game jam.
